name: Moriah Jaeger
coverLetter:
Hello, 

My name is Moriah Jaeger. I'm 27 years old. I'm a van dweller for 3 reasons. To travel, Pay off my van, and to get healthy space from my family. I'm a hospice/dementia specialist and I'm done watching people pass away. I can relocate very easy. I have a clean background. My goal is to get into the Marijuana field as that's where my heart is. I have over 3 years experience working with marijuana.  I'm very detail and task oriented. I have experience with wet and dry trimming. I can give you excellent work and personal references. Thanks so much for taking the time to read my email!. Big Smiles! 

Moriah Faith Jaeger
Text/call 503 881 9056
